short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Makes the New Tab page a truly blank page which uses no scripts. It also supports light and dark mode.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension makes the New Tab page truly blank which makes it load super fast. Unlike other extensions, this extension does not use any scripts which makes it light on resources. It is only 1.3 KB.
